description:
Many startups, and even established businesses, don't understand how important marketing is to their business. It is quite simple, if you don't market, you wont't be in business for long or you won't grow your business. You will stagnate!

The 5 P's of Marketing Course covers: People, Place, Price, Product and Promotion. Each lecture explains in detail each segment that enable you to understand and implement into your business.
title: 5 P's of Marketing
